channel.title: Phobia - Power to the Players [Oldschool Based Server]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Agechqz.png[/img] Phobia is an oldschool based server, it's based off of 2007 RS and Ardi - The Revolutionary.
[B][URL=http://"http://phobiarsps.com"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dYVJSJ5.png[/img] Home - Click Here[/URL] [URL=http://"http://phobiarsps.com/Phobia.jar"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dYVJSJ5.png[/img] Downloadable Client - Click Here[/URL] [URL=http://"http://phobiarsps.com/webclient"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dYVJSJ5.png[/img] Webclient - Click Here[/URL] [URL=http://"http://forum.phobiarsps.com"][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dYVJSJ5.png[/img] Forum - Click Here[/URL][/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1nAi9nb.png[/img]
[B]Some nice features we have on Phobia: 1. Full Duel Arena Staking 2. Dicing 3. Vote4Cash 4. Chaos Elemental, God Wars, King Black Dragon (KBD) 5. An amazing combat system 6. Crystal Key Chest 7. Slayer 8. Full website 9. And much more, come give Phobia a try and see for yourself.[/B]
[spoiler=PICTURES][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/s4Pfk34.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IkFScid.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uFti1ax.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1zJtWdT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7TDMWgv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4Mz3bUs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/okz0rVI.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XLUS7Nc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Jo96iAo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ePyEcaT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/x1WpYbT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KcpG4cU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SHprxPy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sQKRn7q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tCJDkYr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RC91CVr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vqfutsv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Shw85cS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zqgGaqW.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=MORE FEATURES] [B]No Diagonal Fighting Correctly Randomized Hits Better Clipped Following, Walking, Attacking (NPC & Player) Correctly Mage Following vs Players Correctly Hits Delay Cleanned Process Netty Every Project Insanity Dupe FIXED Duel Arena Safe of Glitches & Dupes Correctly Item Switching Delay Firemaking Redone (Clipped, Ashes, Attempt Fire & Everything, near 100%) Cooking Redone: (95%) like OSRS, need some fixes in burnt method. Fishing Redone (60%) like OSRS Slayer Redone (60%) like OSRS Thieving Redone (60%) like OSRS Woodcutting Redone (90%) like OSRS Farming Redone (80%) like OSRS Herblore Redone (100%) like OSRS Agility (60%) like OSRS Crafting (90%) like OSRS Runecrafting (20%) like OSRS Mining (85%) like OSRS Smithing (85%) like OSRS Flax Picking (90%) like OSRS Walking Check Better Combat System for PI total redone (Mage, Range, Melee) Fixed All Deadlocks Redone Full Wear Item (Equipment), it make server more stable Correctly Max Hits 474 Maps/Animations/Objects/NPCs Better CacheDownloader Fixed Lunar Interface Correctly vengeance spell Quest Tab without process Bank Deposit Boxes Redone Bank PIN System Skills Interfaces 100% 90% of 2007 RS NPC Spawns (Added some custom NPC spawns) Perfect Running Energy Formula Mithril Seeds 90% & Clipped Clan chat 80% Money input (100k, 1M...) also fixed the crash client of this. Al-kharid gate correctly Kill/Death Ratio System & Pk Points And much more, you should see by yourself![/B][/spoiler]
[spoiler=VIDEOS]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xqn-b5Rhn04 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L1vXu-mlHvQ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a93sMmzag-M[/spoiler][/CENTER]

item.title: Phobia - Power to the Players [Oldschool Based Server]
item.dc:creator: @PhobiaRSPS PhobiaRSPS
item.description:
@PhobiaRSPS wrote:

[CENTER]
Phobia is an oldschool based server, it’s based off of 2007 RS and Ardi - The Revolutionary.

[B][URL=http://“http://phobiarsps.com”] Home - Click Here[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://phobiarsps.com/Phobia.jar”] Downloadable Client - Click Here[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://phobiarsps.com/webclient”] Webclient - Click Here[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://forum.phobiarsps.com”] Forum - Click Here[/URL][/B]

[B]Some nice features we have on Phobia:

  1. Full Duel Arena Staking
  2. Dicing
  3. Vote4Cash
  4. Chaos Elemental, God Wars, King Black Dragon (KBD)
  5. An amazing combat system
  6. Crystal Key Chest
  7. Slayer
  8. Full website
  9. And much more, come give Phobia a try and see for yourself.[/B]

[spoiler=PICTURES]


















[/spoiler]

[spoiler=MORE FEATURES]
[B]No Diagonal Fighting
Correctly Randomized Hits
Better Clipped Following, Walking, Attacking (NPC & Player)
Correctly Mage Following vs Players
Correctly Hits Delay
Cleanned Process
Netty
Every Project Insanity Dupe FIXED
Duel Arena Safe of Glitches & Dupes
Correctly Item Switching Delay
Firemaking Redone (Clipped, Ashes, Attempt Fire & Everything, near 100%)
Cooking Redone: (95%) like OSRS, need some fixes in burnt method.
Fishing Redone (60%) like OSRS
Slayer Redone (60%) like OSRS
Thieving Redone (60%) like OSRS
Woodcutting Redone (90%) like OSRS
Farming Redone (80%) like OSRS
Herblore Redone (100%) like OSRS
Agility (60%) like OSRS
Crafting (90%) like OSRS
Runecrafting (20%) like OSRS
Mining (85%) like OSRS
Smithing (85%) like OSRS
Flax Picking (90%) like OSRS
Walking Check
Better Combat System for PI total redone (Mage, Range, Melee)
Fixed All Deadlocks
Redone Full Wear Item (Equipment), it make server more stable
Correctly Max Hits
474 Maps/Animations/Objects/NPCs
Better CacheDownloader
Fixed Lunar Interface
Correctly vengeance spell
Quest Tab without process
Bank Deposit Boxes
Redone Bank PIN System
Skills Interfaces 100%
90% of 2007 RS NPC Spawns (Added some custom NPC spawns)
Perfect Running Energy Formula
Mithril Seeds 90% & Clipped
Clan chat 80%
Money input (100k, 1M…) also fixed the crash client of this.
Al-kharid gate correctly
Kill/Death Ratio System & Pk Points
And much more, you should see by yourself![/B][/spoiler]

[spoiler=VIDEOS]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xqn-b5Rhn04
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L1vXu-mlHvQ
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a93sMmzag-M[/spoiler][/CENTER]
